thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Bannon Tells House Panel He Will Answer Limited, Prewritten Questions

author: Byron Tau
title: Bannon Tells House Panel He Will Answer Limited, Prewritten Questions
text:
WASHINGTON—Former White House chief strategist Steve Bannon on Thursday once again declined to answer some questions about his time in government during an appearance before the House Intelligence Committee, setting the stage for a further showdown with Congress over his continued refusal to provide testimony.
Mr. Bannon, a onetime confidant of Donald Trump who has since become estranged from the president, appeared under subpoena before the committee as part of its ongoing investigation into Russian interference in the 2016... RELATED VIDEO The Trump-Bannon Rift: What Are the Implications? President Trump and his onetime chief strategist Steve Bannon are feuding over revelations from a new book in which Mr. Bannon is Quote: d as saying that a 2016 meeting in Trump Tower between Donald Trump Jr. and some Russian representatives was “treasonous.” WSJ’s Gerald F. Seib explains the implications of the rift. Photo: Getty
